modelDescription: Oracle is cryptographically signed price-info ready to be posted on-chain using Compound's Open Oracle smart contract.

endpoints.description: SignedPrices returns cryptographically signed prices ready to be posted on-chain using Compound's Open Oracle smart contract.

modelFields.description: Timestamp indicates when the latest datapoint was obtained

Messages are an array contains abi-encoded values [kind, timestamp, key, value], where kind always equals to 'prices', timestamp is the time when the price was obtained, key is asset ticker (e.g. 'eth') and value is asset price
Signatures are an array of Ethereum-compatible ECDSA signatures for each message
